content.rendered:
Location: Geelong, Victoria

Also known as: Simonds Stadium; Kardinia Oval; Shell Stadium; Baytec Stadium; Skilled Stadium; GMHBA Stadium

1st innings average score: 173

2nd innings average score: 176

Kardinia Park T20I Stats

– Total T20I matches played at the stadium: 1
– Batting 1st Won: 0
– Batting 2nd Won: 1
– Avg. Score in 1st inning: 173
– Highest Score: 176/8 (Sri Lanka against Australia on 19 Feb 2017)

Note: Only 1 T20I match has been played at Kardinia Park, the stats above show the result of that match

T20 World Cup Match Schedule at Kardinia Park

Planning to make a team for the T20 world cup? Check the T20 World Cup Fantasy league section for detailed squad analysis, and fantasy tips.
